pkgmetadata.longdescription: Local Density-Based Outlier Detection // Flexible procedures to compute local density-based outlier scores for ranking outliers. Both exact and approximate nearest neighbor search can be implemented, while also accommodating multiple k values and four different local density-based methods. It allows for referencing a random subsample of input data or a user specified reference data set to compute outlier scores against, so both unsupervised and semi-supervised outlier detection can be implemented.
